organic.title: Value of Towle Sterling Silver Pieces - Expert Q&A - JustAnswer
organic.snippet: If the pieces read sterling on the back, they are valued at $75 to $95 each. If the word sterling is not there, they are valued at $8 to $10 each.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is towle sterling valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
The Towle sterling silver flatware value is dependent upon the design of the pieces, as well as how well they have been maintained and protected throughout the years. Cherished pieces hold value well, with some sets amounting to over $10,000 in value.
Sep 25, 2024
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Most Valuable Silverware Brands | Samuelson's Diamonds

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How much money can I get for sterling silver flatware?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Sterling silverware may be worth as much as $5-$30+ per item, depending on the weight, condition, and purity. Most of the time when you sell sterling silver flatware, it will be sold to a refiner and melted down into pure silver.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Is Sterling Silver Flatware Valuable? Here's How to Tell!

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is Towle a good brand?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: One of America's oldest, most respected brands, the Towle Silversmiths name dates back to a small colonial silversmith in 1690 Massachusetts. Since then, Towle sterling silver, silver-plated and stainless steel products have been appreciated across the country for their beauty and extraordinary quality.
